location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of his letter dated 23 May, stating the desire of the King of Persia to be provided with 500 plates of glass to line the walls of his palace, and informing that the request had been forwarded to the Court of Directors.
